==Trivia==
===Etymology===
*The letters on the Mysterious Stone Slates spell, in order, SAHMAT.
**{{Lang|''Sahmat''|fa={{wt|شاه مات||Persian}}}} means "checkmate," making it a play on words with {{Lang|[[Safhe Shatranj]]|fa=صفحه شطرنج|fa_tl=chessboard}}, which is where the doors opened by the Mysterious Stone Slates are located near.
